verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David רִיבָ֣ה <S%H7378><s%> Plead יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> [my cause] O LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרִיבַ֑י <S%H3401><s%> with them that strive לְ֝חַ֗ם <S%H3898><s%> with me fight אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֹֽחֲמָֽי׃ <S%H3898><s%> against them that fight
הַחֲזֵ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> Take hold מָגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> of shield וְצִנָּ֑ה <S%H6793><s%> and buckler וְ֝ק֗וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> and stand up בְּעֶזְרָתִֽי׃ <S%H5833><s%> for mine help

וְהָ֘רֵ֤ק <S%H7324><s%> Draw out חֲנִ֣ית <S%H2595><s%> also the spear וּ֭סְגֹר <S%H5462><s%> and stop לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7125><s%> [the way] against רֹדְפָ֑י <S%H7291><s%> them that persecute אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> me say לְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> unto my soul יְֽשֻׁעָתֵ֥ךְ <S%H3444><s%> I [am] thy salvation אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Let them be confounded וְיִכָּלְמוּ֮ <S%H3637><s%> and put to shame מְבַקְשֵׁ֪י <S%H1245><s%> that seek נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> after my soul יִסֹּ֣גוּ <S%H5472><s%> let them be turned אָח֣וֹר <S%H268><s%> back וְיַחְפְּר֑וּ <S%H2659><s%> and brought to confusion חֹ֝שְׁבֵ֗י <S%H2803><s%> that devise רָעָתִֽי׃ <S%H7451><s%> my hurt

יִֽהְי֗וּ <S%H1961><s%> them be like כְּמֹ֥ץ <S%H4671><s%> Let them be as chaff לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before ר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind וּמַלְאַ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> and let the angel יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD דּוֹחֶֽה׃ <S%H1760><s%> chase

יְֽהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> Let דַרְכָּ֗ם <S%H1870><s%> Let their way חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> be dark וַחֲלַקְלַקּ֑וֹת <S%H2519><s%> and slippery וּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> and let the angel יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD רֹדְפָֽם׃ <S%H7291><s%> persecute

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For חִנָּ֣ם <S%H2600><s%> For without cause טָֽמְנוּ־ <S%H2934><s%> have they hid לִ֭י שַׁ֣חַת <S%H7845><s%> [in] a pit רִשְׁתָּ֑ם <S%H7568><s%> for me their net חִ֝נָּ֗ם <S%H2600><s%> [which] without cause חָפְר֥וּ <S%H2658><s%> they have digged לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> for my soul

תְּבוֹאֵ֣הוּ <S%H935><s%> come שׁוֹאָה֮ <S%H7722><s%> Let destruction לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵ֫דָ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge וְרִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <S%H7568><s%> and let his net אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which טָמַ֣ן <S%H2934><s%> that he hath hid תִּלְכְּד֑וֹ <S%H3920><s%> catch בְּ֝שׁוֹאָ֗ה <S%H7722><s%> himself into that very destruction יִפָּל־ <S%H5307><s%> let him fall בָּֽהּ׃

וְ֭נַפְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> And my soul תָּגִ֣יל <S%H1523><s%> shall be joyful בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD תָּ֝שִׂישׂ <S%H7797><s%> it shall rejoice בִּישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3444><s%> in his salvation

כָּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> All עַצְמוֹתַ֨י ׀ <S%H6106><s%> All my bones תֹּאמַרְנָה֮ <S%H559><s%> shall say יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who כָ֫מ֥וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> is like מַצִּ֣יל <S%H5337><s%> who [is] like unto thee which deliverest עָ֭נִי <S%H6041><s%> the poor מֵחָזָ֣ק <S%H2389><s%> from him that is too strong מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> is too וְעָנִ֥י <S%H6041><s%> for him yea the poor וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן <S%H34><s%> and the needy מִגֹּזְלֽוֹ׃ <S%H1497><s%> from him that spoileth

יְ֭קוּמוּן <S%H6965><s%> did rise up עֵדֵ֣י <S%H5707><s%> witnesses חָמָ֑ס <S%H2555><s%> FALSE אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> [things] that I knew יִשְׁאָלֽוּנִי׃ <S%H7592><s%> they laid to my charge

יְשַׁלְּמ֣וּנִי <S%H7999><s%> They rewarded רָ֭עָה <S%H7451><s%> me evil תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash טוֹבָ֗ה <S%H2896><s%> for good שְׁכ֣וֹל <S%H7908><s%> [to] the spoiling לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> of my soul

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> Me בַּחֲלוֹתָ֡ם <S%H2470><s%> But as for me when they were sick לְב֬וּשִׁי <S%H3830><s%> my clothing שָׂ֗ק <S%H8242><s%> [was] sackcloth עִנֵּ֣יתִי <S%H6031><s%> I humbled בַצּ֣וֹם <S%H6685><s%> with fasting נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my soul וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י <S%H8605><s%> and my prayer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto חֵיקִ֥י <S%H2436><s%> into mine own bosom תָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> returned

כְּרֵֽעַ־ <S%H7453><s%> myself as though [he had been] my friend כְּאָ֣ח <S%H251><s%> [or] brother לִ֭י הִתְהַלָּ֑כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> I behaved כַּאֲבֶל־ <S%H57><s%> as one that mourneth אֵ֝֗ם <S%H517><s%> [for his] mother קֹדֵ֥ר <S%H6937><s%> heavily שַׁחֽוֹתִי׃ <S%H7817><s%> I bowed down

וּבְצַלְעִי֮ <S%H6761><s%> But in mine adversity שָׂמְח֪וּ <S%H8055><s%> they rejoiced וְֽנֶאֱ֫סָ֥פוּ <S%H622><s%> and gathered themselves together נֶאֶסְפ֬וּ <S%H622><s%> gathered themselves together עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> against נֵ֭כִים <S%H5222><s%> [yea] the abjects וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without יָדַ֑עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> against me and I knew קָֽרְע֥וּ <S%H7167><s%> [it] not they did tear וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> without דָֽמּוּ׃ <S%H1826><s%> [me] and ceased

בְּ֭חַנְפֵי <S%H2611><s%> With hypocritical לַעֲגֵ֣י <S%H3934><s%> mockers מָע֑וֹג <S%H4580><s%> in feasts חָרֹ֖ק <S%H2786><s%> they gnashed עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> with שִׁנֵּֽימוֹ׃ <S%H8127><s%> upon me with their teeth

אֲדֹנָי֮ <S%H136><s%> Lord כַּמָּ֪ה <S%H4100><s%> how תִּ֫רְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> how long wilt thou look on הָשִׁ֣יבָה <S%H7725><s%> ? rescue נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> my soul מִשֹּׁאֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H7722><s%> from their destructions מִ֝כְּפִירִ֗ים <S%H3715><s%> from the lions יְחִידָתִֽי׃ <S%H3173><s%> my darling

א֭וֹדְךָ <S%H3034><s%> I will give thee thanks בְּקָהָ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> congregation רָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> in the great בְּעַ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> people עָצ֣וּם <S%H6099><s%> thee among much אֲהַֽלְלֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H1984><s%> I will praise אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <S%H8055><s%> cheer up

לִ֣י אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> Let not them that are mine enemies שֶׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> wrongfully שֹׂנְאַ֥י <S%H8130><s%> that hate חִ֝נָּ֗ם <S%H2600><s%> me without a cause יִקְרְצוּ־ <S%H7169><s%> over me [neither] let them wink עָֽיִן׃ <S%H5869><s%> with the eye

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> not peace יְדַ֫בֵּ֥רוּ <S%H1696><s%> For they speak וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> against רִגְעֵי־ <S%H7282><s%> against [them that are] quiet אֶ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> matters מִ֝רְמוֹת <S%H4820><s%> deceitful יַחֲשֹׁבֽוּן׃ <S%H2803><s%> but they devise

וַיַּרְחִ֥יבוּ <S%H7337><s%> wide עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> against פִּ֫יהֶ֥ם <S%H6310><s%> Yea they opened their mouth אָ֭מְרוּ <S%H559><s%> against me [and] said הֶאָ֣ח ׀ <S%H1889><s%> Aha הֶאָ֑ח <S%H1889><s%> aha רָאֲתָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> hath seen עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5869><s%> our eye

רָאִ֣יתָה <S%H7200><s%> [This] thou hast seen יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּחֱרַ֑שׁ <S%H2790><s%> keep not silence אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> O Lord אֲל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּרְחַ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> be not far מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

הָעִ֣ירָה <S%H5782><s%> Stir up וְ֭הָקִיצָה <S%H6974><s%> thyself and awake לְמִשְׁפָּטִ֑י <S%H4941><s%> to my judgment אֱלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> my God וַֽאדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> and my Lord לְרִיבִֽי׃ <S%H7379><s%> [even] unto my cause

שָׁפְטֵ֣נִי <S%H8199><s%> Judge כְ֭צִדְקְךָ <S%H6664><s%> according to thy righteousness יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֗י <S%H430><s%> my God וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <S%H8055><s%> and let them not rejoice לִֽי׃

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> Let them not say בְ֭לִבָּם <S%H3820><s%> in their hearts הֶאָ֣ח <S%H1889><s%> Ah נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <S%H5315><s%> so would we have it אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יֹ֝אמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> let them not say בִּֽלַּעֲנֽוּהוּ׃ <S%H1104><s%> We have swallowed him up

יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Let them be ashamed וְיַחְפְּר֨וּ ׀ <S%H2659><s%> and brought to confusion יַחְדָּו֮ <S%H3162><s%> together שְׂמֵחֵ֪י <S%H8056><s%> that rejoice רָעָ֫תִ֥י <S%H7451><s%> at mine hurt יִֽלְבְּשׁוּ־ <S%H3847><s%> let them be clothed בֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> with shame וּכְלִמָּ֑ה <S%H3639><s%> and dishonour הַֽמַּגְדִּילִ֥ים <S%H1431><s%> that magnify עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

יָרֹ֣נּוּ <S%H7442><s%> Let them shout for joy וְיִשְׂמְחוּ֮ <S%H8055><s%> and be glad חֲפֵצֵ֪י <S%H2655><s%> that favour צִ֫דְקִ֥י <S%H6664><s%> my righteous cause וְיֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> yea let them say תָ֭מִיד <S%H8548><s%> continually יִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> be magnified יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Let the LORD הֶ֝חָפֵ֗ץ <S%H2655><s%> which hath pleasure שְׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in the prosperity עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5650><s%> of his servant

וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי <S%H3956><s%> And my tongue תֶּהְגֶּ֣ה <S%H1897><s%> shall speak צִדְקֶ֑ךָ <S%H6664><s%> of thy righteousness כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֝יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8416><s%> [and] of thy praise
